0: It turned out to be a great wedding and reception and a good time was had by all
We took a tour of the facility that was guided by Julie
Great hotel service food amenities etc
You can always add different amenities after arriving
Very elegant surroundings accommodations and meals
We spent a few days here again and we were so supposed at how beautiful it was especially the new lobby and decorated for the Holidays
1: When we arrived we were given a robe and slippers and given a tour of the amenities dry and wet sauna indoor pool and more
Carpets rugs including the lobby are quite stained buffet was not that good
There was not anything wrong I just felt room amenties did not reflect the cost of the room
The beauty of the facility great but the air conditioner was malfunctioning which made it difficult to rest during the night
The rooms are a bit outdated there is no indoor pool the gym is a joke and very small no water in the room coffee maker in the room old
before giving all the negative aspect I will say they have a very clean facility but let me start with the food if you like salty food then eat there
Very disappointed with the facilities Friendly staff
I expected a bit more posh amentities not the single ply tissue you get in public restrooms
Broken equipment in the fitness center
Due to location dining outside the facility is very limited
